Table of Contents

Name

ahf2grp - AHF to halo group format

Synopsis

ahf2grp [parameter=value]

Description

The AHF group finder program writes out a group membership (ascii) table, but the halos

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input dataset. This must be a specially formatted ascii table. No default.
out=
Output dataset. This will be a specially formatted ascii table. No Default.
nbody=
Maximum index particles in input (e.g. 128**3) [30]
nmax=
Max lines in data, if pipe. Use 0 on a file, if you want it to count lines.

Examples

See Also

tabmath(1NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben
